list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: added methods for type of attacks in Card class and a method to find out if 2 cells are adjusting or not

task.summary: added body for applying a spell on a hero in map debugged inserting method for hero and spell
added method for applying spell on heroes and minions
added a cell impact enum class
added a few methods for applying spell and pulling some changes
added methods for applying spells on a self hero and a method for applying spell on all self forces
added a method in spell class for applying spell on a column of enemy forces
added a method in spell class for applying square 2x2 spell on forces
added 3 methods in CellImpactType class for applying 3 different impact on a card
added a method in spell class for applying spell effect on a 2x2 square on map
added a method for applying a spell on a self minion cell in map
implementing AI for the second player
added method for applying spell on enemyHero and enemyMinion in spell class
added method for applying spell in an empty cell
added another constructor for player with 2 parameters (username and passWord)
added methods for type of attacks in Card class and a method to find out if 2 cells are adjusting or not
added methods for inserting a card in map and check if it is valid
